summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1875, for the improvement of Harrison Street, in the City of Seattle, from First Avenue North to Broad Street; Broad Street, from Harrison Street to Mercer Street, and Mercer Street, from Broad Street to Westlake Avenue, by planking the same to a width of sixteen (16) feet, under Ordinance No. 19521, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
